about_the_game:
Embark on a journey through a nostalgic and emotional experience with Crossing Borders. In this immersive and story-driven adventure, players take on the role of a desperate young man trying to cross the border. With stunning visuals, captivating music, and challenging gameplay, you'll find yourself fully immersed in a heart-wrenching story of love and survival. Make tough decisions and face the consequences as you navigate through dangerous terrain and outsmart border guards. Will you make it across, or will you be caught and forced to face the consequences of your actions? Play now and find out.

Key Features:

  • For fans of experimental story-driven games like Journey and Firewatch.
  • A short game that lasts around half an hour.
  • An emotional and nostalgic story made by a solo developer

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains themes such as self-harm and suicide and may not be appropriate to some viewers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 capable video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Experience the emotional journey of Crossing Borders, a first person narrative-driven game that takes you on a perilous journey to cross a dangerous border. Immerse yourself in a world filled with stunning landscapes and discover the story of a young person's determination to cross the border.

English*, Romanian
